cards.special_text:
When Serenyi dies, exile him. When you do, create Antihero's Path, a black Saga enchantment token with the following loyalty abilities as chapters, in order.
[+1]: Create a 2/1 red Human creature token.
[0]: Put a lifelink counter on target permanent you control.
[-3]: This permanent deals 3 damage to any target. This damages creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.
